mappings.description: Reference to a Deployment using the device mapping
mappings.doc: The deployment in which the device mapping is used, so the device can send deployment events to Astarte for the create request

mappings.description: The name of the device driver to use for this request.
mappings.doc: Note that if this is specified the capabilities are ignored when selecting a device driver. Default value is an empty string

mappings.description: A list of capabilities; an OR list of AND lists of capabilities.
mappings.doc: Note that if a driver is specified the capabilities have no effect on selecting a driver as the driver name is used directly. Note that if no driver is specified the capabilities are used to select a driver with the required capabilities. JSON encoded array, so an array of arrays
Driver-specific options, specified as a key/value pairs. These options are passed directly to the driver
